title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, October 9, 2020
description: It's the birthday of writer Belva Plain (1915-2010), whose first book, "Evergreen," stayed on the New York Times best-seller list for 61 weeks.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of writer Belva Plain (1915-2010), whose first book, "Evergreen," stayed on the New York Times best-seller list for 61 weeks.
